en_US.text: 在18年8月8日，我们正式宣布隐币-无封锁的加密货币即将到来。

zh_CN.text: 在18年8月8日，我们正式宣布隐币-无封锁的加密货币即将到来。

en_US.content.desktop.body.main_screen.free:
Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB) to give YNB to everyone that purchases Lantern Pro! Purchase now to get access to today’s giveaway!

What is Yinbi?
en_US.content.desktop.body.secondary_screen.fr: Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB) to give YNB to everyone that purchases Lantern Pro! Purchase now to get access to today’s giveaway! Yinbi (YNB) is a new unblockable cryptocurrency launching soon that allows for fast, reliable, easy to use, and low-cost mobile transactions. Lantern users are the first to have early access to this new cryptocurrency! Find out more here: Yin.bi
en_US.content.desktop.body.main_screen.pro:
Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB) to give YNB to everyone that renews Lantern Pro! Renew now to get access to today’s giveaway!
